attires.name: Gajra
attires.description: A floral garland, usually of jasmine, worn in the hair for festive occasions.

attires.name: Juda Pin
attires.description: Decorative hair pins used to secure buns, often ornate and embellished.

attires.name: Choti (Braid) Decoration
attires.description: Ornamental accessories used to decorate braids, especially in South Indian traditions.

attires.name: Shikha (Choti)
attires.description: A tuft of hair left at the crown of an otherwise shaven head, traditionally worn by Hindu Brahmin men.
